name: Bigo fruit jumping
description:
Similar to the series game Fruit Slice or Fruit Splash, Bigo Fruit Jumping brings all gamer a lot of fun and exciting.

There are so cute animals like panda, bunny who have to run and jump very skillful on circling Fruit Slices
Let's help them jump out of the current Fruit Slice and set their food on another one
Move forwards and experience all fresh Fruit in Bigo fruit jumping.

Is it simple to play Bigo Fruit Jumping?
- Tap into the screen to kick-off the game.
- The animal runs on the Fruit Slice which is circling.
- Tap the screen to make them jump
- The platform always slides since you start playing game. So don't stop so long! Your character will be pushed off and fall down when he touch the left side of the screen.
- In addition, if the animal can not reach a new fruit, he also dies.

What things are noticed?
- Pick up your coins in the game to level up new characters in the shop.
- Faster speed in the time onward
- Share with friends if you enjoy the game
- Invite and complete with your friend and lift your position on the leader board

Bigo Fruit Jumping Game Features:
- Graphics: 2D, fresh, impressive, colorful
- 8 characters
- 5 types of fruit slice
- Sounds: funny
- Template:Characters shop, share and rate, leader board
- Endless playing game
- New more features are coming

You don't play with a fruit splash game, you also don't become a fruit splash hero. But, you can be a master on the new game circling Fruit Slice
Now, Let's get and enjoy Bigo Fruit Jumping!
